name: Bubble Trips
description:
Do you still remember the classic game Bubble Trip? When you were a little boy or a little girl.
The Bubble Trip, as the most classic puzzle game, has been popular for a really long time. No matter how old are you or what job you do, everybody loves this game.

Bubble Trip is so interesting. You can train your brain and fingers by playing this. Not like word-search game, Bubble trip is applicable in all of the countries and suitable for all adults. It′s so cool.

And now, we are back. This is a brand-new updated version.

Features:
There are more than 2000 interesting and exciting levels waiting for your challenge.
-Simple and easy to learn, difficult to master
-Unexpected scenes and experience
-Fluent animation, cool game
-precise control, two ways to shoot

How to play this game?
-Move your finger to the positon where the target. Aim at it and just shoot!
-You could clear them with 3 same bubbles
-Clear all the bubble levels and hit the target.

-If you want to keep the elder members of your family away from playing mahjong, poker and gambling, you could suggest them to play Bubble Trip.
-If you don′t want your wife/husband to bother you, you could suggest them to play Bubble Trip.
-If your kids always make you in trouble, you could just let them play Bubble Trip.
-If you are alone, Bubble Trip would make you feel accompanied.

No matter where you are and whenever it is,Bubble Trip will always be your company.

Our Bubble Trip is an interesting and addictive game.

The most important is:
As a totally free Bubble Trip, we need commercia ads to survive in this cruel world.
If you don′t like the ads, you could turn off your WIFI.

The last request:
Please download it and leave your evaluation. We′ve been working sor hard to develop a free game. We sincerely need your support. If you think we are not good enough, we will continuously make improvement and changes.
